data.title: Clara Knight Service Details - Daphne, Alabama
data.meta_description: Mrs. Clara Knight, 89, departed this life for her eternal home on June 15, 2018.  A visitation will be held on Friday, June 22, 2018 from 9:00 a.m. until the 11:00 a.m. funeral hour at Twin Beech AME Zion Church, 6664 Twin Beech Rd, Fairhope, AL 36532. Interment will follow in Twin Beech Cemetery Fairhope, AL.   DIGNIFIED AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICES ENTRUSTED TO SMALL'S MORTUARY, INC., 8822 COUNTY ROAD 64, DAPHNE, AL 36526.
data.text:
